title: FS: Lot of 14 T206's $20 a piece
author: Epps

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 14 T206's $20 a piece
posts.post_content:
For sale is a lot of 13 T206's. The scan is too large and I can't attach it. All cards are listed below. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] for scans and with questions or offers. All cards are raw and grade in the range of PR-VG. $250 for the lot or $20 per card if sold individually. I accept check, money order, and cash. I will accept paypal as well. Thanks!

Fred Beck, Piedmont 350
Bill Hinchman/Cleveland, Piedmont 150
Otto Knabe, Piedmont 350
Jack Warhop, Piedmont 350
Frank Bowerman, Piedmont 150
Mickey Doolan/Fielding, Piedmont 350
Hobe Ferris, Piedmont 150
Dolly Gray, Piedmont 350
Frank LaPorte (short, miscut), Piedmont 350
Pryor McElveen, Piedmont 350
Simon Nicholls/Hands On Knees, Piedmont 150
Clyde Engle, Piedmont 350
Jack White, Piedmont 350

Please send scans and prices to jrlebert@gmail

Thanks!
